name: Spell That
description:
WIZARDS & WORDS!

Middle Mouse to Move the camera.

Drag and drop to draw cards from the decks in the top left. From top left, clockwise is Map Tiles, Treasure Cards, Spell Cards, and Monster Cards.

Drag and drop to move Runes, Cards and Player Pieces. Drag onto Discard Here to Discard Runes, Cards (and Monsters).

Refresh Runes with the upper right button on the Rune shelf, Restock spent Runes with the bottom right button.

Double click Map Tiles to flip and reveal them.

Double click Runes to track damage to player health. Restore health by double clicking the Rune again.
